definition: to attack/to inherit/classifier for suits (esp. of funeral robes)

sentences.english: Many southerners said all of the North was responsible for the raid.
sentences.chinese: 許多南方人說，所有的北方人都應該對這次襲擊負責。

sentences.english: The raid was conducted with U. S. military personnel assaulting on two helicopters.
sentences.chinese: 實施襲擊的是兩駕直升機上的美國軍方人員。

sentences.english: How can you possibly charge a 7-year-old child with assault and battery?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼能將一個七歲的孩子判爲襲擊和毆打公職人員罪？

sentences.english: The flexible Red Knife allows officers to rehearse responses to edged weapon attacks.
sentences.chinese: 柔性紅刀可訓練警官模仿在銳器襲擊時反應。

sentences.english: Rain-triggered flood submerges parts of Dazhou.
sentences.chinese: 四川達州遭暴雨襲擊，洪水漫城。

sentences.english: One such raid came while Evazan was hosting a dinner for the Andoan Senator.
sentences.chinese: 有一次襲擊甚至發生在埃瓦贊款待那位安多議員時。

sentences.english: The attacker was identified by the state-run Xinhua news agency as Wu Huanming, 48.
sentences.chinese: 中國新華社確認了該襲擊者名爲吳煥明，四十八歲。

sentences.english: SARS struck both China and some other counties in 2003 .
sentences.chinese: 2003年非典型肺炎襲擊了中國和其他幾個國家。

sentences.english: Oslash; Starscream, Overlord, Scorponok and Onslaught agree to follow Megatron.
sentences.chinese: 紅蜘蛛，霸主，薩克巨人與襲擊同謀共保威震天。

sentences.english: He says they'll use suicide bombers in their attacks.
sentences.chinese: 他說他們會在襲擊中使用自殺式炸彈。

sentences.english: Over the years, North Korea has made many attacks near the island.
sentences.chinese: 多年以來，北韓多次向延坪島附近發動襲擊。

sentences.english: Early one morning, Shmi was attacked and abducted by the savage Tusken Raiders.
sentences.chinese: 一天清晨，野蠻的塔斯肯襲擊者毆打併綁架了施密。

sentences.english: A gun like this would also be useful for stopping pirate attacks against commercial shipping.
sentences.chinese: 像這樣的電磁炮同樣也可用於阻止海盜襲擊商用船隻。

sentences.english: Great supplies were sent to the disaster-hit area.
sentences.chinese: 大量的給養被運送到遭受災難襲擊的地區。

sentences.english: This area is hit by an average of about 5 hailstorms a year.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區平均每年遭受大約五次冰雹襲擊。

definition: to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to open fire/to shoot a gun
to set on fire/to commit arson
to beat up/to come to blows/battery (law)
terrorist attack (abbr. for 恐怖襲擊|恐怖袭击[kong3 bu4 xi2 ji1])
to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
